languages.text: "Достойное пополнение в священном братстве Вольных Торговцев. В этот темный час нам как никогда нуж{mf|ен|на} решительн{mf|ый|ая} и набожн{mf|ый|ая} союзни{mf|к|ца}". {n}Инцендия церемонно кланяется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Достойное пополнение в священном братстве Вольных Торговцев. В этот темный час нам как никогда нуж{mf|ен|на} решительн{mf|ый|ая} и набожн{mf|ый|ая} союзни{mf|к|ца}". {n}Инцендия церемонно кланяется.{/n}

languages.text: "A worthy addition to the sacred fellowship of Rogue Traders. In this dark hour more than ever do we find ourselves in need of a decisive and pious ally." {n}Chorda bows solemnly.{/n}

languages.text: 「神聖なる自由開拓者の集まりに立派な人物が増えたな。このかつてない暗黒の時代において必要なのは、固い決意と篤い信仰心を持つ仲間だ」{n}コーダは心を込めて頭を下げる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A worthy addition to the sacred fellowship of Rogue Traders. In this dark hour more than ever do we find ourselves in need of a decisive and pious ally." {n}Chorda bows solemnly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「神聖なる自由開拓者の集まりに立派な人物が増えたな。このかつてない暗黒の時代において必要なのは、固い決意と篤い信仰心を持つ仲間だ」{n}コーダは心を込めて頭を下げる。{/n}

languages.text: “我很高兴看到行商浪人的神圣同盟来了一位新的成员。在这前所未有的动荡时刻，我们正热切盼望吸纳一位坚定而虔诚的盟友。”{n}库尔达庄重地行了个礼。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A worthy addition to the sacred fellowship of Rogue Traders. In this dark hour more than ever do we find ourselves in need of a decisive and pious ally." {n}Chorda bows solemnly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴看到行商浪人的神圣同盟来了一位新的成员。在这前所未有的动荡时刻，我们正热切盼望吸纳一位坚定而虔诚的盟友。”{n}库尔达庄重地行了个礼。{/n}

languages.text: «Un{mf||a} miembro dign{mf|o|a} de la sagrada hermandad de Comerciantes Independientes. En esta hora oscura, necesitamos más que nunca aliados píos y decididos». {n}Chorda te hace una reverencia solemne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A worthy addition to the sacred fellowship of Rogue Traders. In this dark hour more than ever do we find ourselves in need of a decisive and pious ally." {n}Chorda bows solemnly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Un{mf||a} miembro dign{mf|o|a} de la sagrada hermandad de Comerciantes Independientes. En esta hora oscura, necesitamos más que nunca aliados píos y decididos». {n}Chorda te hace una reverencia solemne.{/n}

languages.text: « Les libres-marchands gagnent à vous avoir dans leurs rangs. En ces heures sombres, nous avons plus que jamais besoin d'{mf|un allié|une alliée} dont la résolution n'a d'égale que la piété. » {n}Chorda s'incline solennellement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A worthy addition to the sacred fellowship of Rogue Traders. In this dark hour more than ever do we find ourselves in need of a decisive and pious ally." {n}Chorda bows solemnly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les libres-marchands gagnent à vous avoir dans leurs rangs. En ces heures sombres, nous avons plus que jamais besoin d'{mf|un allié|une alliée} dont la résolution n'a d'égale que la piété. » {n}Chorda s'incline solennellement.{/n}

languages.text: "Eine würdige Erweiterung des heiligen Zusammenschlusses der Freihändler. In dieser dunklen Stunde brauchen wir mehr denn je {mf|einen entschlossenen und frommen Verbündeten|eine entschlossene und fromme Verbündete}." {n}Chorda verbeugt sich ernst.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A worthy addition to the sacred fellowship of Rogue Traders. In this dark hour more than ever do we find ourselves in need of a decisive and pious ally." {n}Chorda bows solemnly.{/n}

languages.text: "Hür Tacirlerin kutsal kardeşliğine değerli bir katkı... Bu zor zamanlarda kararlı ve mütedeyyin bir müttefike her zamankinden daha fazla ihtiyaç duyuyoruz." {n}Chorda ağırbaşlılıkla eğiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A worthy addition to the sacred fellowship of Rogue Traders. In this dark hour more than ever do we find ourselves in need of a decisive and pious ally." {n}Chorda bows solemnly.{/n}
